Beer With Geeks 132: Why’d It Have To Be Snakes?

04 Nov 2016
Beer With Geeks Podcasts

This week on Beer With Geeks, Marvel’s Luke Cage is on tap as Tim and Frank discuss what worked, what didn’t, why the music was so amazing, and why all the villains are named after snakes. Cheers!
